# Darkvision (Ninja Trick)
## Overview
*Darkvision (Su):* This trick allows the ninja to use her ki to enhance her sight, granting [[S3.1D-F - Universal Monster Rules D-F (Bestiary 6 Apx)|darkvision]] out to a range of 60 feet. Using this trick is a standard action that costs 1 ki point. The enhanced senses last for 1 hour.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 15
